Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Card class which acts as a template for the cards that can be used during the game New Changes Made: Small NPE problems with some cards Last Changes Made: Fixed Display of Utility Railroad Decrement

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(int nGroup,
            int nIndex,
            boolean boolCanKeep,
            java.lang.String strDescription)
        Creates a card with the specified attributes.
        Parameters:
        nGroup - The index of which group the card belongs to
        nIndex - The index of the card within said group
        boolCanKeep - True if the user can hold onto the card, false if it has to be used
        strDescription - Description of what the card does
